main event: A bright red object with four or five spears coming out of the top was observed over Kirksville, Missouri. The object changed colors and revealed a scene inside with a man in a white coat walking around.
interesting points: The object was not entirely round, it had an indentation on one side.
The observer was able to see a man in a white coat inside the object, moving around as if in slow motion.
Another man in a tight suit also appeared inside the object.
A black line with yellow markings moved across the white area inside the object before it disappeared in a black smoky cloud.
The observer compared the scene inside the object to watching television.
sighted object: A large round red object with spears or legs
